dialog.text: the top half is a blue sky with two clouds near the button of the sky. The button half is grass with some trees in the middle, connecting the sky and the grass.
How tall are the trees? Are the trees in a straight line?
the trees are around one third of the image. it starts from the left and slightly passes the middle. The overall shape of the trees are oval-shaped
Do the trees span the entire picture? From left to right?
the trees are mainly on the left side. The button part of the image should be covered with green grass. There is some cloud where the trees and sky meet.
Is there any water in the picture?
the trees are looks like a forest from far. It should be more dense. and you can reduce the size of the trees by one third.
I do not have anymore peek. so i will end it now.
